apex-action-addsection:
Used in the Apex skin. See for example {{canonicalurl:Talk:Main_Page|useskin=apex}}
{{Identical|Add topic}}
apex-action-delete:
Used in the Apex skin, as the name of a tab at the top of the page. See for example {{canonicalurl:Main_Page|useskin=apex}}

{{Identical|Delete}}
apex-action-move:
Used in the Apex skin, on the tabs at the top of the page. See for example {{canonicalurl:Talk:Main_Page|useskin=apex}}

{{Identical|Move}}
apex-action-protect:
Tab at top of page, in apex skin

{{Identical|Protect}}
apex-action-undelete:
Tab at top of page, in apex skin.
{{Identical|Undelete}}
apex-action-unprotect:
Tab at top of page, in apex skin.
{{Identical|Change protection}}
apex-view-create:
Tab label in the Apex skin. See for example {{canonicalurl:Foo|useskin=apex}}
{{Identical|Create}}
apex-view-edit:
Tab label in the Apex skin. See for example {{canonicalurl:Main_Page|useskin=apex}}
{{Identical|Edit}}
apex-view-history:
Tab label in the Apex skin. See for example {{canonicalurl:Main_Page|useskin=apex}}
{{Identical|View history}}
apex-view-view:
Tab label in the Apex skin (verb). See for example {{canonicalurl:Main_Page|useskin=apex}}.
{{Identical|Read}}
apex-view-viewsource:
Tab label in the Apex skin.
{{Identical|View source}}
